thread.title: Watch: Billie Joe Armstrong Invites Disabled Fan To Join Green Day Onstage & Play Guitar [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Billie Joe Armstrong Invites Disabled Fan To Join Green Day Onstage & Play Guitar [News]

title: Watch: Billie Joe Armstrong Invites Disabled Fan To Join Green Day Onstage & Play Guitar [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 9 hours ago 8 
During Green Day's recent show at London's O2 Arena, frontman Billie Joe Armstrong invited a disabled fan named Rachel to join the gang onstage and rock out a bit. 
As you can see in the video below, not only did Billie invite the girl onstage, but he also let her keep the guitar as a memory. 
Needless to say, the crowd gave the frontman plenty of kudos. Watch the footage below. billie joe armstrong from @greenday proving that he is one of the good guys and getting a disabled fan on stage to play guitar pic.twitter.com/oeXVjx4OFq
